titles.title: To amend the Federal employee compensation provisions of title 5, United States Code, to provide benefits for a disability involving the large intestine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E885)

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety.

committee.name: House Education and Labor
committee.subcommittee: Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Amends Federal civil service law to provide for compensation payments for Federal employees who are disabled as a result of work related injuries causing permanent loss, or loss of use, of the large intestine.
